name: GRIPPY
description: $GRIPPY is the sticky meme frog of Base — goofy, wholesome, and powered by pure meme energy. Inspired by Furie-style chaos and community culture, Grippy isn’t just another frog, he’s a sticky symbol of resilience, humor, and diamond-handed holding. Built with zero taxes, a renounced contract, and liquidity locked, $GRIPPY launched as a true fair-play meme coin for the people. The project thrives on organic growth, viral campaigns, and community-driven governance. With staking pools, a Grippy Dashboard, and merch/NFT drops in the roadmap, $GRIPPY is here to stick as Base’s No. 1 meme.
